title: New: Bodhi – Deliquesce (Ifan Dafydd Remix)
body:
It’s been a slow day here at **CitR**, but this well structured and graceful **[Ifan Dafydd](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/19157-new-ifan-dafydd-celwydd/ "New: Ifan Dafydd – Celwydd")** remix of the **Bodhi** track, _Deliquesce_, is certainly a nice way to end an evening.

_Culture/Deliquesce_ is due out on Feb 4.

excerpt.full: It’s been a slow day here at CitR, but this well structured and graceful Ifan Dafydd remix of the Bodhi track, Deliquesce, is certainly a nice way to end an evening. Culture/Deliquesce is due out on Feb 4.
